Package albumcollection

Class Date

java.lang.Object
albumcollection.Date
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Date>
public class Date extends Object implements Comparable<Date>
This class creates and defines the properties of a Date object
Author:
Ved Patel, Vivek Manthri

      private boolean isLeap(int year)
      Helper method that checks if the given year is a leap year
      Parameters:
      year - the year to check
      Returns:
      true if the given year is a leap year; false otherwise

      Checks if a date is a valid calendar date
      Returns:
      true if the date is valid; false otherwise

      Determines if the date is either today or in the future compared to the current date

      public boolean isBefore1900()
      Determines if the date is before the year 1900
      Returns:
      true if the date is before 1900; false otherwise

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Date o)
      Compare two Date objects based on year, month, and day
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Date>
      Parameters:
      o - the date object to be compared
      Returns:
      a negative one, zero, or a positive one depending on if this date is less than, equal to, or greater than the specified date

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Testbed main() for Date class, which tests the isValid() method. Tests five invalid and two valid test cases
      Parameters:
      args - the command line arguments
